interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Beast Blue Ultra Cooling Body Wash, 6 oz -Beast Review Date: 2020/03/06 Store: Tame the Beast Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Tame the Beast', 'Scent': 'Green Tea', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 3 x 2 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '817662018539'} Review Text: A friendly word of warning: don’t use Beast Blue Cooling Body Wash down south unless you like tingly body parts.

The consistency of the body wash is a little watery, so it’s easy to squeeze out more than you might want. It lathers well and rinses clean without leaving behind a residue.

I really like the smell of the body wash. It’s a strong, crisp scent that really does wake you up. My nose tingled the first time I smelled it. The scent is hard to describe. I can’t pick out any individual notes, just a crisp smell that made me go “Wow, this smells cool and different.” Review Title: Beast Blue Cooling Body Wash Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Water Flosser Cordless Oral Irrigator Portable Rechargeable Dental Flossers with 5 Modes & 6 Tips Water Flossing with 300ml Water Tank for Home and Travel, Braces & Bridges Care (Blue) Duomishu {'Brand': 'Duomishu', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Special Feature': 'Por, Multiple Operation Modes, Multiple Tips', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Tank Volume': '300 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.9 x 5 x 3.1 inches; 1.2 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'hf-6', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '786738939194', 'Manufacturer': 'Duomishu'} If you’ve never used a water flosser before, there’s a definite learning curve. Expect to get wet the first few times, if not more. The learning curve and mess is worth it -- my mouth generally feels cleaner after using one -- but I don’t love this particular model.

I wanted a water flosser that wouldn’t take up a lot of space on my bathroom counter. This one is a sort of all-in-one, with the reservoir built into the handle, but I kept getting water bubbles in the tank/tip, which made flossing take a lot longer.

There’s only 3 speeds: low, medium, and high. The low is quite low. And because of where the speed switch button is, it’s really easy to accidentally switch speeds while using the flosser.

The flosser charges via USB, but with a proprietary end (not A or C or anything like that). Cordless Water Flosser Pharmacopia Tangerine-Flavored Lip Balm - Set of 2, 0.25oz - Nourishing Herbal Lip Elixir with 100% Natural and Certified Organic Ingredients Pharmacopia {'Brand': 'Pharmacopia', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Soothing,Nourishing', 'Package Dimensions': '3.6 x 1.7 x 0.7 inches; 0.25 Ounces', 'UPC': '087819800366'} I spend 99% of my life with chapped lips, so I’m always looking for a chapstick or lip balm that will actually work.

I was intrigued by the hemp oil in the Pharmacopia Tangerine-Flavored Lip Balm. But not all of the ingredients are listed in the product information. I am allergic to beeswax, which is the second ingredient in the lip balm. So I was unable to use it.

I’m including a picture of the tube, but for reference, here are the ingredients: helianthus annuus (sunflower) oil, beeswax/cire d’abeille, olea europaea (extra virgin olive) oil, aroma (flavor), cannabis sativa (hemp) seed oil, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, tocopherol (vitamin E), aloe barbadensis. Pharmacopia Tangerine-Flavored Lip Balm Kale Firm & Smooth Body Lotion - Superfood Infused Firming Body Lotion with Kale. 6.8 fl.oz, Anti-Aging Moisturizing Lotion For All Skin Types Cancun Collection {'Brand': 'Cancun Collection', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '6.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '659436986671'} Kale Leaf Extract (Brassica Oleracea Acephala) is the 14th ingredient listed out of 23 for the Cancun Collection Kale Firm & Smooth Body Lotion. This lotion is made in Canada.

The lotion absorbed quickly into my skin, but did leave behind a slightly tacky feel for about 5 minutes after application.

It’s currently the middle of winter where I am, so I was able to see just how moisturizing the lotion is for me when I already had dry skin. The lotion has a medium-weight consistency and gets the job done for about half the day.

What I don’t like about this lotion is the scent. The scent is subtle, sort of like vanilla coconut, and it’s fine at first. But the scent lingers for several hours, and after that time, I’ve had enough of it. Cancun Collection Kale Firm & Smooth Body Lotion Workman's Friend Ultimate Hand Care Bundle WORKMAN'S FRIEND {'Package Dimensions': '9 x 4.5 x 2.3 inches; 1.3 Pounds', 'UPC': '023857030709'} For me, I like the Hand Cleaner and Barrier Cream the most in this bundle. I found that the Superior Healing Hand Cream was just average. These products might seem dude oriented, but they work for anyone.

Superior Hand Cleaner with Activated Charcoal (individually 4/5 stars):
--Works great to remove grease and odors. I like the pumice in the cleanser, as it gives me a real clean, scrubby feeling.

Superior Barrier Skin Cream (individually 4/5 stars):
--Actually does help prevent grease or oil from staining my hands. Also helps keep my fingernails from becoming a dirt mess when I weed without gloves. But doesn’t provide much of a moisturizing effect.

Superior Healing Hand Cream (individually 3/5 stars):
--Truly unscented hand lotion. But it’s just average as a lotion -- it took a few days of 2-3x per day applications to help heal my cracked hands. Workman's Friend Ultimate Hand Care Bundle Beast Blue Ultra Cooling Body Wash, 6 oz -Beast Tame the Beast {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Tame the Beast', 'Scent': 'Green Tea', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 3 x 2 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '817662018539'} A friendly word of warning: don’t use Beast Blue Cooling Body Wash down south unless you like tingly body parts.

The consistency of the body wash is a little watery, so it’s easy to squeeze out more than you might want. It lathers well and rinses clean without leaving behind a residue.

I really like the smell of the body wash. It’s a strong, crisp scent that really does wake you up. My nose tingled the first time I smelled it. The scent is hard to describe. I can’t pick out any individual notes, just a crisp smell that made me go “Wow, this smells cool and different.” Beast Blue Cooling Body Wash
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Health & Hygiene Focus**: The user prioritizes oral hygiene, lip care, and now shows an interest in body care products, specifically those that offer a refreshing experience.
- **Ingredient Awareness**: Demonstrates a strong awareness of ingredients, particularly due to allergies, favoring transparency and safety in personal care products.
- **Portability & Space Efficiency**: Values portable and travel-friendly options while preferring compact designs that do not occupy much counter space, reflecting a minimalist approach.
- **Ease of Use**: Challenges with the learning curve of new hygiene tools lead to a preference for intuitive designs that minimize inconvenience.
- **Functional Features**: Seeks products with multiple capabilities but favors straightforward controls to prevent accidental adjustments.
- **Charging Convenience**: Prefers USB charging solutions over proprietary connectors, emphasizing practicality in usage.
- **Skepticism Towards Claims**: Approaches new products with caution, prioritizing solid performance and reliable ingredients over marketing hype.
- **Scent Sensitivity**: Sensitive to product scents, now demonstrating an openness to unique and invigorating fragrances as long as they are not overwhelming.
- **Additional Preferences**: Recently expressed appreciation for hand care products that effectively remove dirt, indicating a broader interest in multi-functional skincare that supports an active lifestyle.

Overall, the user seeks a blend of effectiveness, convenience, and safety in personal care tools, appreciating simplicity in design and ingredient clarity while being mindful of sensory experiences, particularly in scent.
